1   package org.infinispan.cdi.test.cache.embedded;
2   
3   import org.infinispan.AdvancedCache;
4   import org.infinispan.Cache;
5   import org.infinispan.cdi.test.DefaultTestEmbeddedCacheManagerProducer;
6   import org.jboss.arquillian.container.test.api.Deployment;
7   import org.jboss.arquillian.testng.Arquillian;
8   import org.jboss.shrinkwrap.api.Archive;
9   import org.testng.annotations.Test;
10  
11  import javax.inject.Inject;
12  
13  import static org.infinispan.cdi.test.testutil.Deployments.baseDeployment;
14  import static org.infinispan.commons.api.BasicCacheContainer.DEFAULT_CACHE_NAME;
15  import static org.testng.Assert.assertEquals;
16  
17  /**
18   * Tests that the default cache is available and can be injected with no configuration.
19   *
20   * @author Pete Muir
21   * @author Kevin Pollet <kevin.pollet@serli.com> (C) 2011 SERLI
22   */
23  @Test(groups = "functional", testName = "cdi.test.cache.embedded.DefaultCacheTest")
24  public class DefaultCacheTest extends Arquillian {
25  
26     @Deployment
27     public static Archive<?> deployment() {
28        return baseDeployment()
29              .addClass(DefaultCacheTest.class)
30              .addClass(DefaultTestEmbeddedCacheManagerProducer.class);
31     }
32  
33     @Inject
34     private Cache<String, String> cache;
35  
36     @Inject
37     private AdvancedCache<String, String> advancedCache;
38  
39     public void testDefaultCache() {
40        // Simple test to make sure the default cache works
41        cache.put("pete", "British");
42        cache.put("manik", "Sri Lankan");
43        assertEquals(cache.get("pete"), "British");
44        assertEquals(cache.get("manik"), "Sri Lankan");
45        assertEquals(cache.getName(), DEFAULT_CACHE_NAME);
46        /*
47         * Check that the advanced cache contains the same data as the simple
48         * cache. As we can inject either Cache or AdvancedCache, this is double
49         * checking that they both refer to the same underlying impl and Seam
50         * Clouds isn't returning the wrong thing.
51         */
52        assertEquals(advancedCache.get("pete"), "British");
53        assertEquals(advancedCache.get("manik"), "Sri Lankan");
54        assertEquals(advancedCache.getName(), DEFAULT_CACHE_NAME);
55     }
56  }
